channel.title: SAA 2018 Government Digital Data - Matthew McKnight

item.title: The Maryland Archaeological Synthesis Project: One State’s Solution to Archaeology’s Crushing Gray Literature Problem
item.description:
Matthew McKnight

Since passage of the National Historic Preservation Act fifty-two years ago a growing body of valuable data has been generated by state agencies, CRM professionals, and preservation officers. Unfortunately, this data is usually trapped in an archaic paper-based format, restricted geographically to a single state archive. All too …
item.dc:creator: Matthew McKnight
